title: Switch currency to Indian Rupees and replace/manage catalog with common Indian food items

requirements.text: Change all currency formatting and currency-related UI labels in the calculator to Indian Rupees (₹/INR), including line totals, subtotal/tax/discount/final total, and the fixed-discount selector/labels.
acceptanceCriteria: All monetary values rendered via the app’s currency formatter display in INR with the ₹ symbol.
The discount type toggle/tab and breakdown label for fixed discount no longer show '$' and instead show '₹' (or 'INR' where appropriate).
No USD currency formatting remains in the UI for totals, catalog prices, or breakdown amounts.

requirements.text: Remove the current predefined catalog items and replace them with a common list of Indian food items (English names) with reasonable default unit prices in INR and sensible categories.

quotes: delete the present items and add indian food names

acceptanceCriteria: The predefined catalog no longer contains the existing non-food items (e.g., office supplies/electronics/services).
The catalog displays a common Indian food list (e.g., Idli, Dosa, Samosa, Biryani, Paneer Butter Masala, Chapati, Rice, Dal, etc.) grouped into appropriate categories.
Each catalog item has a unit price in INR and displays correctly using the INR currency formatter.

requirements.text: Add catalog management controls in the UI to allow users to add new catalog items and delete existing catalog items from the predefined catalog list during runtime.

quotes: give an option to add and delete items

acceptanceCriteria: The catalog UI includes a clear way to add a new catalog item with at least: name, unit price, and optional category.
The catalog UI includes a delete control for each catalog item to remove it from the catalog list.
Adding or deleting catalog items immediately updates the catalog list and search results without requiring a page reload.

requirements.text: Add an "Out of stock" status/toggle per catalog item and prevent out-of-stock items from being added to the line items cart.
acceptanceCriteria: Each catalog item in the UI has an "Out of stock" toggle/status indicator.
When a catalog item is marked out of stock, the "Add" action is disabled (or otherwise blocked) and the UI clearly indicates it is out of stock.
Attempting to add an out-of-stock item does not add a new line item to the calculator.

constraints: Frontend files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be edited; compose with existing components instead.
Do not introduce additional backend services or databases; keep changes within the existing React+TypeScript frontend unless explicitly required.
nonGoals: Persisting catalog changes (add/delete/out-of-stock) across browser refreshes or across devices/users.
Adding backend APIs, authentication changes, or Internet Identity requirements for catalog management.
Adding new non-calculator features unrelated to currency/catalog management.
